term.title: macromonomer molecule

item.text: A macromolecule that has one end-group which enables it to act as a monomer molecule, contributing only a single monomeric unit to a chain of the final macromolecule.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2290 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
